title: I didn't get my Draven day icons
body: I bought prime time Draven for the legendary spinning axes and to get the icon but i still havent received my icon, i even got aether wing Kayle out of the mystery gift, then i bought a friend the urf kench icon but didnt get the winion icon. (day 5 still no icons)(day 8 is coming and supplies are starting to run low, how much longer is this gonna be) I FINALLY GOT THEM BOIS!!!

replies.body: For real how hard is it to give the people who deserve them icons. They had no problem immediately taking my money to buy the skins so i could get the Icons. amiright ?

It's a bit more difficult than you may think! :D There are thousands of players who earn icons after events, and we have a systematic way of distributing so a. everyone gets their icons in a timely manner, and b. it's smooth distribution on our, meaning nothing breaks and makes it take any longer than it should. :)
same, I bought project yi and I didn't receive the draaaven icon
They're still being distributed. Hang tight.
Icons will be added to your account on or before April 25th. We have a lot to hand out and are workin' on it. ^-^

thank you for this information, I am glad I will be receiving them, but in the future can you say in the Draven day or any special day that will get people icons, that it may not come the day after the event is over.

We may have not known the exact time frame when the content was created, but I think this is something we could implement in the future. For now, we do have a [ticker](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) on the support site. :)
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210014153--April-14-Draven-Day-icons-will-be-distributed-to-accounts-by-April-25- u will get the icons by 25 april

Anyone have them yet? I still don't I gifted 4 skins that day and bought myself one?? or bought RP for someone to gift me? lol
I definitely gifted 4 skins though, so whats up?

Its been what 3-4 days since the 11th (i suppose closer to 3 days but still)
Whats going on? I have history of skins being gifted :)
Hi again from Quebec... I still didn't receive the both icon. It is normal?
still nothing?
Maybe Riot forgot
Still dont have my draven icons..... and i did everything needed.....
I gifted my friend a legendary skin for the draven spinning axe and i haven't reseced anything yet.
my english is not the best so does some1 want to write a letter to support? cuz i dont think we are getting any icons..
72 hours later still no icon....
Same for me. Anyone receive their icon yet?  {{champion:119}}
I didn't get my icons either..
I havent got it yet and i bought like 3 ultimate skin at 1820 RP and i gifted one to my friend.
i did not receive my draven icon too
Yeah I still haven't gotten mine, I want my DRAVEEEEEN!! I did both the draven Winion and the Draaaaaven icon participation thing!
They said it takes up to 72 hours to be given, idk.
Same here!
